phrs.translation: 肌痛性脑脊髓炎, 肌痛性脑脊髓膜炎

sentences.sentence: If your fatigue has lasted for six months or more and is so severe that you can't manage daily tasks, chronic fatigue syndrome (also known as myalgic encephalopathy or me) could be to blame.
sentences.translation: 如果你的疲劳感长达六个月或更多，并且它是如此严重以至于你不能成功完成日常任务，长期的疲劳症状(也被了解为慢性疲劳症)应当视为罪魁祸首。
